mapper.sql: id, email, password, rid, create_at AS createAt, flag
mapper.select:
select
from reg_email where rid=#{rid} limit 1

select
from reg_email where email=#{email} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reg_email (email, password, rid, create_at, flag) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{rid}, #{createAt}, #{flag})
mapper.update: UPDATE reg_email SET flag=#{flag} WHERE id=#{id}
